wikipedia_page.main:
David Rees "Dai" Lloyd (born 2 December 1956 in Tywyn, Gwynedd) is a Welsh politician. He has a wife Catherine, and they have 3 children. He was the Plaid Cymru Member of the Senedd for South Wales West from 1999 to 2011. and was again returned as Plaid Cymru Senedd Member for South Wales West in the 2016 National Assembly for Wales election. He stood down at the 2021 Senedd election.
Lloyd was latterly Plaid Cymru's Shadow Secretary for Culture and Infrastructure, as well as being Chair of the Plaid Cymru Senedd Group and Chair of the Senedd Health, Social Care, and Sport Committee.
